ai-patthana21.40:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.40:0.3_0: Talking forgets, etc., for the sake of clinging, and so on,
ai-patthana21.40:1.1_0: It’s not the cause of condition for the donors, for the sake of surmounting, and for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana21.40:1.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana21.40:2.1_0: It’s not the cause of condition for the donors of serenity; for the sake of exertion is a cause of misery; for the sake ofpace is a condition for the repulsion.
ai-patthana21.40:2.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana21.40:3.1_0: is not getting enough for one at the right time, nor doing it.
ai-patthana21.40:4.1_0: in no way underlying tendency to conceit,
